task.title: Use the default playback behavior
task.shortdesc:
You can choose to use default ad behaviors. Q: iOS: Do we need something equivalent to what's in the Android doc? (As follows:)
To use default behaviors:
If you have implemented your own AdvertisingFactory/client factory , then return null for createAdPolicySelector.
If you do not have custom implementation for the AdvertisingFactory/client factory, uses a default ad policy selector.
